description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for handling HTTP requests related to ticket data. It exposes an endpoint '/api/tickets/rows' to retrieve parsed ticket rows with support for pagination and filtering by application name and month. The class interacts with the TicketMetricsService to fetch data and includes validation of query parameters.

classes.name: TicketDataController
classes.description: REST controller exposing endpoints to retrieve parsed ticket rows from uploaded Excel files.

methods.name: getRows
methods.description: Handles GET requests to fetch parsed ticket rows with optional filtering and pagination, performing input validation and delegating to the service layer.
